abstract: The acquisition of antimicrobial resistance by foodborne pathogens is a serious human health concern. In Japan, combinations of antimicrobial resistance genes in Antimicrobial resistance transfer was tested in The high homology between pSal_249Sch and pSal_238Inf suggests they have a common ancestor.
